title: 162: Pride and Prejudice, by Jane Austen
dc:creator: A.J. Hanenburg
description: Jane Austen is a delight, and her novel Pride and Prejudice is no exception. In this episode, we review the book and talk about what it takes to change as drastically as Elizabeth and Darcy.
itunes:author: Collins, Wickham, and Darcy. A.J. is Darcy.
itunes:subtitle: Now with more flirting!
itunes:summary: Jane Austen is a delight, and her novel Pride and Prejudice is no exception. In this episode, we review the book and talk about what it takes to change as drastically as Elizabeth and Darcy.
